com.github.bwsoft.iris.message

Interface Field

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Group, Message
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SBEField, SBEMessage

    public interface Field
extends java.io.Serializable
    The definition of a message field. It is identified by a name and an id. They have to be unique in its parent field, the Group, but the same name or id can appear in other groups. The field id, field type, its array length, and its parent typically need to be decided upon construction. And it is typically created by a factory method such as Group.addField(short, FieldType, short) in the Group class.
    Author:
    yzhou
